page.title: 07Domestic Services
page.content: {Electricity}Eastern electricity Luton, { Gas}_Not available { Water}_Thames valley,Bedford {Sewage} Cambridge { Telephone}Cheddington and Tring numbers,through Oxford. { Rates}Aylesbury Vale District Council (Rubbish Collection) {Education}Bucks{ {Library}Mobile from Aylesbury{Lawyers} Solicitors in every town{Police}Thames Valley,Kidlington{Post Office}Tring and Sub_Office(Village){Deliveries} Daily house to house of bread,milk, newspapers,post {Food}Mobile Fish and Chips,Ice cream,Groceries_Regular visits,pausing at recognized places. Voluntary Services_Village people offer their special skills to one another.
